text: Ilka Soares (21 June 1932 â€“ 18 June 2022) was a Brazilian actress and model. She was in the 1949 movie Iracema. Soares was born in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Her acted from 1949 until 2013. Soares died at a hospital in Rio de Janeiro on 18 June 2022 from lung cancer at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Brazilian stage actors Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro Category:Brazilian models
